headline: Synchrony and Ashley Celebrate Nearly 15 Years of Helping Consumers Furnish Their Homes
summary: Synchrony (NYSE: SYF), a premier consumer financial services company, and Ashley, the largest furniture store brand in North America, have renewed their long-standing consumer financing partnership. This extension ensures that Ashley customers will continue to benefit from Synchrony's flexible financing solutions making it easier to bring home quality furnishings that fit their lifestyle and budget.
